languages.text: "Я, конечно, понимаю, что ситуация у нас критическая, но... Проклятье, я — старший офицер корабля, хоть и не люблю об этом напоминать. А ты, сопляк, мятежник, чуть не продырявивший мне голову".
"I understand that the situation is critical, but... Damn it, I am a senior officer of this ship, as much as I hate to remind you. And you are a little mutineer who almost put a hole in my head."
languages.original_text: "Я, конечно, понимаю, что ситуация у нас критическая, но... Проклятье, я — старший офицер корабля, хоть и не люблю об этом напоминать. А ты, сопляк, мятежник, чуть не продырявивший мне голову".

traits.locale_text: "I understand the situation is critical, but… Damn it, I am a senior officer of this ship, as much as I hate to remind you. And you are a little mutineer who has almost put a hole in my head."
"I understand the situation is critical, but… Damn it, I am a senior officer of this ship, as much as I hate to remind you. And you are a little mutineer who has almost put a hole in my head."

"I understand that the situation is critical, but... Damn it, I am a senior officer of this ship, as much as I hate to remind you. And you are a little mutineer who almost put a hole in my head."

languages.text: «Entiendo que es una situación crítica, pero... Odio tener que recordarte que soy un maldito oficial veterano de esta nave. Y tú no eres más que un pequeño amotinado que casi me agujerea la cabeza».
languages.original_text: "I understand that the situation is critical, but... Damn it, I am a senior officer of this ship, as much as I hate to remind you. And you are a little mutineer who almost put a hole in my head."

traits.locale_text: «Entiendo que es una situación crítica, pero... Odio tener que recordarte que soy un maldito oficial veterano de esta nave. Y tú no eres más que un pequeño amotinado que casi me agujerea la cabeza».

languages.text: 「危機的状況だったとは理解しているけど…くそっ、わざわざ言うのも嫌だが、私はこの船の上級士官だぞ。そしてお前のようなちっぽけな反乱者が、私の頭に穴を開けるところだった」
languages.original_text: "I understand that the situation is critical, but... Damn it, I am a senior officer of this ship, as much as I hate to remind you. And you are a little mutineer who almost put a hole in my head."

traits.locale_text: 「危機的状況だったとは理解しているけど…くそっ、わざわざ言うのも嫌だが、私はこの船の上級士官だぞ。そしてお前のようなちっぽけな反乱者が、私の頭に穴を開けるところだった」

languages.text: “我知道现在的情况很紧急，但是……真要命，虽然我不想提醒你，但我是这艘船上的高阶军官。而你，你不过是个小叛乱分子，你差点把我的脑袋打出个洞来。”
languages.original_text: "I understand that the situation is critical, but... Damn it, I am a senior officer of this ship, as much as I hate to remind you. And you are a little mutineer who almost put a hole in my head."

traits.locale_text: “我知道现在的情况很紧急，但是……真要命，虽然我不想提醒你，但我是这艘船上的高阶军官。而你，你不过是个小叛乱分子，你差点把我的脑袋打出个洞来。”

languages.text: "Mir ist bewusst, dass die Lage kritisch ist, doch ... Verdammt, ich bin leitender Offizier auf diesem Schiff, auch wenn ich nur ungern daran erinnere. Und Ihr seid ein kleiner Meuterer, der mir fast ein Loch in den Kopf geschossen hätte."
languages.original_text: "I understand that the situation is critical, but... Damn it, I am a senior officer of this ship, as much as I hate to remind you. And you are a little mutineer who almost put a hole in my head."

traits.locale_text: "Mir ist bewusst, dass die Lage kritisch ist, doch ... Verdammt, ich bin leitender Offizier auf diesem Schiff, auch wenn ich nur ungern daran erinnere. Und Ihr seid ein kleiner Meuterer, der mir fast ein Loch in den Kopf geschossen hätte."

languages.text: « Je veux bien comprendre que la situation est critique, mais... Bon sang, même si ça me fait mal de le rappeler, je suis un officier supérieur de ce vaisseau. Et toi, tu n'es qu'un petit rebelle qui a bien failli me trouer la tête. »
languages.original_text: "I understand that the situation is critical, but... Damn it, I am a senior officer of this ship, as much as I hate to remind you. And you are a little mutineer who almost put a hole in my head."

traits.locale_text: « Je veux bien comprendre que la situation est critique, mais... Bon sang, même si ça me fait mal de le rappeler, je suis un officier supérieur de ce vaisseau. Et toi, tu n'es qu'un petit rebelle qui a bien failli me trouer la tête. »

languages.text: "Durumun vahim olduğunu biliyorum ama... Böbürlenmek gibi olmasın, ben de bu geminin kıdemli bir subayıyım. Sen ise az kalsın kafamda bir delik açan sefil bir isyancısın."
languages.original_text: "I understand that the situation is critical, but... Damn it, I am a senior officer of this ship, as much as I hate to remind you. And you are a little mutineer who almost put a hole in my head."
